nodes.text: Drixo was a Hutt gangster with a female personality and a rival of Progga the Hutt.

Drixo hired Dubrak Qennto and his crew to transport furs—and to smuggle firegems hidden within them—to Comra, but Qennto's light freighter Bargain Hunter was intercepted by Progga and, eventually, Commander Mitth'raw'nuruodo of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force, which caused a delay of the shipment for more than three weeks.
Prior to her death, Drixo was the owner of Bilbringi Depot on Bilbringi VII.
